ygData.subject: Re: RE: Hunting at 14
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/15/99 10:09:25 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... As a dark elf necro... EXCEPT for the wizards guild (which I have always widely avoided) I
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/15/99 10:09:25 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
srutkowski@... writes:

> You kill the NPC vendors on the sister island in OOT? I thought they were
> higher level than that. Playing a dark elf necro and binding yourself in
> Freeport is not something I would do, even if I killed "one MILLION" orcs.

As a dark elf necro... EXCEPT for the wizards guild (which I have always
widely avoided) I have NEVER had a problem EAST or WEST freeport.
Now binding yourself in the necro guild in West Freeport would not be a bad
idea at all.

NORTH Freeport is a different matter. I would not bind myself there, but I
have also not had any problems there after my reign of terror on ORCS for
nearly a month. I have killed well over a thousand orcs... So many orcs
that the Rivervale GUARD (not merchants) are actually amiable to me... (I am
still KOS by rivervale merchants...but I am working on that...)

Sonoroud tomebinder.
